## \_convertArrayToObject() function

Convert an array to a key/value object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _convertArrayToObject<T>(array: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, key?: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Response<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; |  |
|  key | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | If property on the array value that will be used as the key for its value. If null, the value is used as key. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Response&lt;T&gt;

An object containing keys with accociated values
